info.title: Three Axis Sensor

sensor.threeaxis.name: sensor.threeaxis
sensor.threeaxis.description: This Resource provides a representation of the measurement from a three-axis sensor. The Property "orientation" is an array of numbers representing x-plane, y-plane and z-plane values. The unit of measurement for each pane is 'g'.

orientation.name: orientation
orientation.description: The array containing x-plane, y-plane and z-plane orientation in 'g'.
